Bellissima Intense Hydrating Essence

Brand: Bellissima

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) BRAN WATER, WATER, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERETH-26, MACADAMIA TERNIFOLIA SEED OIL, PROPANEDIOL, BETAINE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/ SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE

10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, ARGININE, ADENOSINE, DISODIUM EDTA, PANTHENOL, NIACINAMIDE, MADECASSOSIDE, ASIATICOSIDE, CERAMIDE NP, MAGNESIUM ASCORBYL PHOSPHATE, BETA-GLUCAN, ANTHEMIS NOBILIS FLOWER EXTRACT, GLYCERIN, PORTULACA OLERACEA EXTRACT, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT, OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) OIL, LINUM USI

ROSE) OIL, LINUM USITATISSIMUM (LINSEED) SEED OIL, SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, 12-HEXANEDIOL

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
